00051 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_mdt_hsm_vars[];

00060 struct mdt_object *mdt_hsm_get_md_hsm(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00061                                       const struct lu_fid *fid,
00062                                       struct md_hsm *hsm)
00063 {
00064         struct md_attr          *ma;
00065         struct mdt_object       *obj;
00066         int                      rc;
00067         ENTRY;
00068 
00069         ma = &mti->mti_attr;
00070         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
00071         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00072 
00073         /* find object by FID */
00074         obj = mdt_object_find(mti->mti_env, mti->mti_mdt, fid);
00075         if (IS_ERR(obj))
00076                 RETURN(obj);
00077 
00078         if (!mdt_object_exists(obj)) {
00079                 /* no more object */
00080                 mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
00081                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOENT));
00082         }
00083 
00084         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(mti, obj, ma);
00085         if (rc) {
00086                 mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
00087                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00088         }
00089 
00090         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_HSM)
00091                 *hsm = ma->ma_hsm;
00092         else
00093                 memset(hsm, 0, sizeof(*hsm));
00094         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00095         RETURN(obj);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void mdt_hsm_dump_hal(int level, const char *prefix,
00099                       struct hsm_action_list *hal)
00100 {
00101         int                      i, sz;
00102         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00103         char                     buf[12];
00104 
00105         CDEBUG(level, "%s: HAL header: version %X count %d compound "LPX64
00106                       " archive_id %d flags "LPX64"\n",
00107                prefix, hal->hal_version, hal->hal_count,
00108                hal->hal_compound_id, hal->hal_archive_id, hal->hal_flags);
00109 
00110         hai = hai_first(hal);
00111         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++) {
00112                 sz = hai->hai_len - sizeof(*hai);
00113                 CDEBUG(level, "%s %d: fid="DFID" dfid="DFID
00114                        " compound/cookie="LPX64"/"LPX64
00115                        " action=%s extent="LPX64"-"LPX64" gid="LPX64
00116                        " datalen=%d data=[%s]\n",
00117                        prefix, i,
00118                        PFID(&hai->hai_fid), PFID(&hai->hai_dfid),
00119                        hal->hal_compound_id, hai->hai_cookie,
00120                        hsm_copytool_action2name(hai->hai_action),
00121                        hai->hai_extent.offset,
00122                        hai->hai_extent.length,
00123                        hai->hai_gid, sz,
00124                        hai_dump_data_field(hai, buf, sizeof(buf)));
00125                 hai = hai_next(hai);
00126         }
00127 }
