00133 struct hsm_scan_data {
00134         struct mdt_thread_info          *mti;
00135         char                             fs_name[MTI_NAME_MAXLEN+1];
00136         /* request to be send to agents */
00137         int                              request_sz;    
00138         int                              max_requests;  
00139         int                              request_cnt;   
00140         struct {
00141                 int                      hal_sz;
00142                 int                      hal_used_sz;
00143                 struct hsm_action_list  *hal;
00144         } *request;
00145 };
00146 
00158 static int mdt_coordinator_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00159                               struct llog_handle *llh,
00160                               struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr,
00161                               void *data)
00162 {
00163         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
00164         struct hsm_scan_data            *hsd;
00165         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00166         struct mdt_device               *mdt;
00167         struct coordinator              *cdt;
00168         int                              rc;
00169         ENTRY;
00170 
00171         hsd = data;
00172         mdt = hsd->mti->mti_mdt;
00173         cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00174 
00175         larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
00176         dump_llog_agent_req_rec("mdt_coordinator_cb(): ", larr);
00177         switch (larr->arr_status) {
00178         case ARS_WAITING: {
00179                 int i, empty_slot, found;
00180 
00181                 /* Are agents full? */
00182                 if (atomic_read(&cdt->cdt_request_count) ==
00183                     cdt->cdt_max_requests)
00184                         break;
00185 
00186                 /* first search whether the request is found in the list we
00187                  * have built and if there is room in the request vector */
00188                 empty_slot = -1;
00189                 found = -1;
00190                 for (i = 0; i < hsd->max_requests &&
00191                             (empty_slot == -1 || found == -1); i++) {
00192                         if (hsd->request[i].hal == NULL) {
00193                                 empty_slot = i;
00194                                 continue;
00195                         }
00196                         if (hsd->request[i].hal->hal_compound_id ==
00197                                 larr->arr_compound_id) {
00198                                 found = i;
00199                                 continue;
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202                 if (found == -1 && empty_slot == -1)
00203                         /* unknown request and no more room for new request,
00204                          * continue scan for to find other entries for
00205                          * already found request
00206                          */
00207                         RETURN(0);
00208 
00209                 if (found == -1) {
00210                         struct hsm_action_list *hal;
00211 
00212                         /* request is not already known */
00213                         /* allocates hai vector size just needs to be large
00214                          * enough */
00215                         hsd->request[empty_slot].hal_sz =
00216                                      sizeof(*hsd->request[empty_slot].hal) +
00217                                      cfs_size_round(MTI_NAME_MAXLEN+1) +
00218                                      2 * cfs_size_round(larr->arr_hai.hai_len);
00219                         OBD_ALLOC(hal, hsd->request[empty_slot].hal_sz);
00220                         if (!hal) {
00221                                 CERROR("%s: Cannot allocate memory (%d o)"
00222                                        "for compound "LPX64"\n",
00223                                        mdt_obd_name(mdt),
00224                                        hsd->request[i].hal_sz,
00225                                        larr->arr_compound_id);
00226                                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00227                         }
00228                         hal->hal_version = HAL_VERSION;
00229                         strlcpy(hal->hal_fsname, hsd->fs_name,
00230                                 MTI_NAME_MAXLEN + 1);
00231                         hal->hal_compound_id = larr->arr_compound_id;
00232                         hal->hal_archive_id = larr->arr_archive_id;
00233                         hal->hal_flags = larr->arr_flags;
00234                         hal->hal_count = 0;
00235                         hsd->request[empty_slot].hal_used_sz = hal_size(hal);
00236                         hsd->request[empty_slot].hal = hal;
00237                         hsd->request_cnt++;
00238                         found = empty_slot;
00239                         hai = hai_first(hal);
00240                 } else {
00241                         /* request is known */
00242                         /* we check if record archive num is the same as the
00243                          * known request, if not we will serve it in multiple
00244                          * time because we do not know if the agent can serve
00245                          * multiple backend
00246                          * a use case is a compound made of multiple restore
00247                          * where the files are not archived in the same backend
00248                          */
00249                         if (larr->arr_archive_id !=
00250                             hsd->request[found].hal->hal_archive_id)
00251                                 RETURN(0);
00252 
00253                         if (hsd->request[found].hal_sz <
00254                             hsd->request[found].hal_used_sz +
00255                              cfs_size_round(larr->arr_hai.hai_len)) {
00256                                 /* Not enough room, need an extension */
00257                                 void *hal_buffer;
00258                                 int sz;
00259 
00260                                 sz = 2 * hsd->request[found].hal_sz;
00261                                 OBD_ALLOC(hal_buffer, sz);
00262                                 if (!hal_buffer) {
00263                                         CERROR("%s: Cannot allocate memory "
00264                                                "(%d o) for compound "LPX64"\n",
00265                                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), sz,
00266                                                larr->arr_compound_id);
00267                                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00268                                 }
00269                                 memcpy(hal_buffer, hsd->request[found].hal,
00270                                        hsd->request[found].hal_used_sz);
00271                                 OBD_FREE(hsd->request[found].hal,
00272                                          hsd->request[found].hal_sz);
00273                                 hsd->request[found].hal = hal_buffer;
00274                                 hsd->request[found].hal_sz = sz;
00275                         }
00276                         hai = hai_first(hsd->request[found].hal);
00277                         for (i = 0; i < hsd->request[found].hal->hal_count;
00278                              i++)
00279                                 hai = hai_next(hai);
00280                 }
00281                 memcpy(hai, &larr->arr_hai, larr->arr_hai.hai_len);
00282                 hai->hai_cookie = larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie;
00283                 hai->hai_gid = larr->arr_hai.hai_gid;
00284 
00285                 hsd->request[found].hal_used_sz +=
00286                                                    cfs_size_round(hai->hai_len);
00287                 hsd->request[found].hal->hal_count++;
00288                 break;
00289         }
00290         case ARS_STARTED: {
00291                 struct hsm_progress_kernel pgs;
00292                 struct cdt_agent_req *car;
00293                 cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current_sec();
00294                 cfs_time_t last;
00295 
00296                 /* we search for a running request
00297                  * error may happen if coordinator crashes or stopped
00298                  * with running request
00299                  */
00300                 car = mdt_cdt_find_request(cdt, larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie, NULL);
00301                 if (car == NULL) {
00302                         last = larr->arr_req_create;
00303                 } else {
00304                         last = car->car_req_update;
00305                         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 /* test if request too long, if yes cancel it
00309                  * the same way the copy tool acknowledge a cancel request */
00310                 if (now <= last + cdt->cdt_active_req_timeout)
00311                         RETURN(0);
00312 
00313                 dump_llog_agent_req_rec("request timed out, start cleaning",
00314                                         larr);
00315                 /* a too old cancel request just needs to be removed
00316                  * this can happen, if copy tool does not support
00317                  * cancel for other requests, we have to remove the
00318                  * running request and notify the copytool */
00319                 pgs.hpk_fid = larr->arr_hai.hai_fid;
00320                 pgs.hpk_cookie = larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie;
00321                 pgs.hpk_extent = larr->arr_hai.hai_extent;
00322                 pgs.hpk_flags = HP_FLAG_COMPLETED;
00323                 pgs.hpk_errval = ENOSYS;
00324                 pgs.hpk_data_version = 0;
00325 
00326                 /* update request state, but do not record in llog, to
00327                  * avoid deadlock on cdt_llog_lock */
00328                 rc = mdt_hsm_update_request_state(hsd->mti, &pgs, 0);
00329                 if (rc)
00330                         CERROR("%s: cannot cleanup timed out request: "
00331                                DFID" for cookie "LPX64" action=%s\n",
00332                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
00333                                PFID(&pgs.hpk_fid), pgs.hpk_cookie,
00334                                hsm_copytool_action2name(
00335                                        larr->arr_hai.hai_action));
00336 
00337                 if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00338                         /* The request no longer exists, forget
00339                          * about it, and do not send a cancel request
00340                          * to the client, for which an error will be
00341                          * sent back, leading to an endless cycle of
00342                          * cancellation. */
00343                         RETURN(LLOG_DEL_RECORD);
00344                 }
00345 
00346                 /* XXX A cancel request cannot be cancelled. */
00347                 if (larr->arr_hai.hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL)
00348                         RETURN(0);
00349 
00350                 larr->arr_status = ARS_CANCELED;
00351                 larr->arr_req_change = now;
00352                 rc = llog_write(hsd->mti->mti_env, llh, hdr, hdr->lrh_index);
00353                 if (rc < 0)
00354                         CERROR("%s: cannot update agent log: rc = %d\n",
00355                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00356                 break;
00357         }
00358         case ARS_FAILED:
00359         case ARS_CANCELED:
00360         case ARS_SUCCEED:
00361                 if ((larr->arr_req_change + cdt->cdt_grace_delay) <
00362                     cfs_time_current_sec())
00363                         RETURN(LLOG_DEL_RECORD);
00364                 break;
00365         }
00366         RETURN(0);
00367 }
00368 
00375 int hsm_cdt_procfs_init(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00376 {
00377         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00378         int                      rc = 0;
00379         ENTRY;
00380 
00381         /* init /proc entries, failure is not critical */
00382         cdt->cdt_proc_dir = lprocfs_register("hsm",
00383                                              mdt2obd_dev(mdt)->obd_proc_entry,
00384                                              lprocfs_mdt_hsm_vars, mdt);
00385         if (IS_ERR(cdt->cdt_proc_dir)) {
00386                 rc = PTR_ERR(cdt->cdt_proc_dir);
00387                 CERROR("%s: Cannot create 'hsm' directory in mdt proc dir,"
00388                        " rc=%d\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00389                 cdt->cdt_proc_dir = NULL;
00390                 RETURN(rc);
00391         }
00392 
00393         RETURN(0);
00394 }
00395 
00400 void  hsm_cdt_procfs_fini(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00401 {
00402         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00403 
00404         LASSERT(cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED);
00405         if (cdt->cdt_proc_dir != NULL)
00406                 lprocfs_remove(&cdt->cdt_proc_dir);
00407 }
00408 
00414 struct lprocfs_vars *hsm_cdt_get_proc_vars(void)
00415 {
00416         return lprocfs_mdt_hsm_vars;
00417 }
00418 
00425 static int mdt_coordinator(void *data)
00426 {
00427         struct mdt_thread_info  *mti = data;
00428         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
00429         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00430         struct hsm_scan_data     hsd = { NULL };
00431         int                      rc = 0;
00432         ENTRY;
00433 
00434         cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags = SVC_RUNNING;
00435         wake_up(&cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00436 
00437         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: coordinator thread starting, pid=%d\n",
00438                mdt_obd_name(mdt), current_pid());
00439 
00440         /* we use a copy of cdt_max_requests in the cb, so if cdt_max_requests
00441          * increases due to a change from /proc we do not overflow the
00442          * hsd.request[] vector
00443          */
00444         hsd.max_requests = cdt->cdt_max_requests;
00445         hsd.request_sz = hsd.max_requests * sizeof(*hsd.request);
00446         OBD_ALLOC(hsd.request, hsd.request_sz);
00447         if (!hsd.request)
00448                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00449 
00450         hsd.mti = mti;
00451         obd_uuid2fsname(hsd.fs_name, mdt_obd_name(mdt), MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00452 
00453         while (1) {
00454                 struct l_wait_info lwi;
00455                 int i;
00456 
00457                 lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT(cfs_time_seconds(cdt->cdt_loop_period),
00458                                   NULL, NULL);
00459                 l_wait_event(cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
00460                              (cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags &
00461                               (SVC_STOPPING|SVC_EVENT)),
00462                              &lwi);
00463 
00464                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "coordinator resumes\n");
00465 
00466                 if (cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags & SVC_STOPPING ||
00467                     cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPING) {
00468                         cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags &= ~SVC_STOPPING;
00469                         rc = 0;
00470                         break;
00471                 }
00472 
00473                 /* wake up before timeout, new work arrives */
00474                 if (cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags & SVC_EVENT)
00475                         cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags &= ~SVC_EVENT;
00476 
00477                 /* if coordinator is suspended continue to wait */
00478                 if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_DISABLE) {
00479                         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "disable state, coordinator sleeps\n");
00480                         continue;
00481                 }
00482 
00483                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "coordinator starts reading llog\n");
00484 
00485                 if (hsd.max_requests != cdt->cdt_max_requests) {
00486                         /* cdt_max_requests has changed,
00487                          * we need to allocate a new buffer
00488                          */
00489                         OBD_FREE(hsd.request, hsd.request_sz);
00490                         hsd.max_requests = cdt->cdt_max_requests;
00491                         hsd.request_sz =
00492                                    hsd.max_requests * sizeof(*hsd.request);
00493                         OBD_ALLOC(hsd.request, hsd.request_sz);
00494                         if (!hsd.request) {
00495                                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00496                                 break;
00497                         }
00498                 }
00499 
00500                 hsd.request_cnt = 0;
00501 
00502                 rc = cdt_llog_process(mti->mti_env, mdt,
00503                                       mdt_coordinator_cb, &hsd);
00504                 if (rc < 0)
00505                         goto clean_cb_alloc;
00506 
00507                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "found %d requests to send\n", hsd.request_cnt);
00508 
00509                 if (list_empty(&cdt->cdt_agents)) {
00510                         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "no agent available, "
00511                                       "coordinator sleeps\n");
00512                         goto clean_cb_alloc;
00513                 }
00514 
00515                 /* here hsd contains a list of requests to be started */
00516                 for (i = 0; i < hsd.max_requests; i++) {
00517                         struct hsm_action_list  *hal = hsd.request[i].hal;
00518                         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
00519                         __u64                   *cookies;
00520                         int                      sz, j;
00521                         enum agent_req_status    status;
00522 
00523                         /* still room for work ? */
00524                         if (atomic_read(&cdt->cdt_request_count) ==
00525                             cdt->cdt_max_requests)
00526                                 break;
00527 
00528                         if (hal == NULL)
00529                                 continue;
00530 
00531                         /* found a request, we start it */
00532                         rc = mdt_hsm_agent_send(mti, hal, 0);
00533                         /* if failure, we suppose it is temporary
00534                          * if the copy tool failed to do the request
00535                          * it has to use hsm_progress
00536                          */
00537                         status = (rc ? ARS_WAITING : ARS_STARTED);
00538 
00539                         /* set up cookie vector to set records status
00540                          * after copy tools start or failed
00541                          */
00542                         sz = hal->hal_count * sizeof(__u64);
00543                         OBD_ALLOC(cookies, sz);
00544                         if (cookies == NULL) {
00545                                 CERROR("%s: Cannot allocate memory (%d o) "
00546                                        "for cookies vector "LPX64"\n",
00547                                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), sz,
00548                                        hal->hal_compound_id);
00549                                 continue;
00550                         }
00551                         hai = hai_first(hal);
00552                         for (j = 0; j < hal->hal_count; j++) {
00553                                 cookies[j] = hai->hai_cookie;
00554                                 hai = hai_next(hai);
00555                         }
00556 
00557                         rc = mdt_agent_record_update(mti->mti_env, mdt, cookies,
00558                                                      hal->hal_count, status);
00559                         if (rc)
00560                                 CERROR("%s: mdt_agent_record_update() failed, "
00561                                        "rc=%d, cannot update status to %s "
00562                                        "for %d cookies\n",
00563                                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc,
00564                                        agent_req_status2name(status),
00565                                        hal->hal_count);
00566 
00567                         OBD_FREE(cookies, sz);
00568                 }
00569 clean_cb_alloc:
00570                 /* free hal allocated by callback */
00571                 for (i = 0; i < hsd.max_requests; i++) {
00572                         if (hsd.request[i].hal) {
00573                                 OBD_FREE(hsd.request[i].hal,
00574                                          hsd.request[i].hal_sz);
00575                                 hsd.request[i].hal_sz = 0;
00576                                 hsd.request[i].hal = NULL;
00577                                 hsd.request_cnt--;
00578                         }
00579                 }
00580                 LASSERT(hsd.request_cnt == 0);
00581 
00582                 /* reset callback data */
00583                 memset(hsd.request, 0, hsd.request_sz);
00584         }
00585         EXIT;
00586 out:
00587         if (hsd.request)
00588                 OBD_FREE(hsd.request, hsd.request_sz);
00589 
00590         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPING) {
00591                 /* request comes from /proc path, so we need to clean cdt
00592                  * struct */
00593                  mdt_hsm_cdt_stop(mdt);
00594                  mdt->mdt_opts.mo_coordinator = 0;
00595         } else {
00596                 /* request comes from a thread event, generated
00597                  * by mdt_stop_coordinator(), we have to ack
00598                  * and cdt cleaning will be done by event sender
00599                  */
00600                 cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags = SVC_STOPPED;
00601                 wake_up(&cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00602         }
00603 
00604         if (rc != 0)
00605                 CERROR("%s: coordinator thread exiting, process=%d, rc=%d\n",
00606                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), current_pid(), rc);
00607         else
00608                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: coordinator thread exiting, process=%d,"
00609                               " no error\n",
00610                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), current_pid());
00611 
00612         return rc;
00613 }
00614 
00623 struct cdt_restore_handle *mdt_hsm_restore_hdl_find(struct coordinator *cdt,
00624                                                        const struct lu_fid *fid)
00625 {
00626         struct cdt_restore_handle       *crh;
00627         ENTRY;
00628 
00629         list_for_each_entry(crh, &cdt->cdt_restore_hdl, crh_list) {
00630                 if (lu_fid_eq(&crh->crh_fid, fid))
00631                         RETURN(crh);
00632         }
00633         RETURN(NULL);
00634 }
00635 
00640 struct hsm_restore_data {
00641         struct mdt_thread_info  *hrd_mti;
00642 };
00643 
00654 static int hsm_restore_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00655                           struct llog_handle *llh,
00656                           struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr, void *data)
00657 {
00658         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
00659         struct hsm_restore_data         *hrd;
00660         struct cdt_restore_handle       *crh;
00661         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00662         struct mdt_thread_info          *mti;
00663         struct coordinator              *cdt;
00664         struct mdt_object               *child;
00665         int rc;
00666         ENTRY;
00667 
00668         hrd = data;
00669         mti = hrd->hrd_mti;
00670         cdt = &mti->mti_mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00671 
00672         larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
00673         hai = &larr->arr_hai;
00674         if (hai->hai_cookie > cdt->cdt_last_cookie)
00675                 /* update the cookie to avoid collision */
00676                 cdt->cdt_last_cookie = hai->hai_cookie + 1;
00677 
00678         if (hai->hai_action != HSMA_RESTORE ||
00679             agent_req_in_final_state(larr->arr_status))
00680                 RETURN(0);
00681 
00682         /* restore request not in a final state */
00683 
00684         /* force replay of restore requests left in started state from previous
00685          * CDT context, to be canceled later if finally found to be incompatible
00686          * when being re-started */
00687         if (larr->arr_status == ARS_STARTED) {
00688                 larr->arr_status = ARS_WAITING;
00689                 larr->arr_req_change = cfs_time_current_sec();
00690                 rc = llog_write(env, llh, hdr, hdr->lrh_index);
00691                 if (rc != 0)
00692                         GOTO(out, rc);
00693         }
00694 
00695         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(crh, mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem);
00696         if (crh == NULL)
00697                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00698 
00699         crh->crh_fid = hai->hai_fid;
00700         /* in V1 all file is restored
00701         crh->extent.start = hai->hai_extent.offset;
00702         crh->extent.end = hai->hai_extent.offset + hai->hai_extent.length;
00703         */
00704         crh->crh_extent.start = 0;
00705         crh->crh_extent.end = hai->hai_extent.length;
00706         /* get the layout lock */
00707         mdt_lock_reg_init(&crh->crh_lh, LCK_EX);
00708         child = mdt_object_find_lock(mti, &crh->crh_fid, &crh->crh_lh,
00709                                      MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT);
00710         if (IS_ERR(child))
00711                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(child));
00712 
00713         rc = 0;
00714         /* we choose to not keep a reference
00715          * on the object during the restore time which can be very long */
00716         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, child);
00717 
00718         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00719         list_add_tail(&crh->crh_list, &cdt->cdt_restore_hdl);
00720         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00721 
00722 out:
00723         RETURN(rc);
00724 }
00725 
00731 static int mdt_hsm_pending_restore(struct mdt_thread_info *mti)
00732 {
00733         struct hsm_restore_data  hrd;
00734         int                      rc;
00735         ENTRY;
00736 
00737         hrd.hrd_mti = mti;
00738 
00739         rc = cdt_llog_process(mti->mti_env, mti->mti_mdt,
00740                               hsm_restore_cb, &hrd);
00741 
00742         RETURN(rc);
00743 }
00744 
00745 static int hsm_init_ucred(struct lu_ucred *uc)
00746 {
00747         ENTRY;
00748 
00749         uc->uc_valid = UCRED_OLD;
00750         uc->uc_o_uid = 0;
00751         uc->uc_o_gid = 0;
00752         uc->uc_o_fsuid = 0;
00753         uc->uc_o_fsgid = 0;
00754         uc->uc_uid = 0;
00755         uc->uc_gid = 0;
00756         uc->uc_fsuid = 0;
00757         uc->uc_fsgid = 0;
00758         uc->uc_suppgids[0] = -1;
00759         uc->uc_suppgids[1] = -1;
00760         uc->uc_cap = CFS_CAP_FS_MASK;
00761         uc->uc_umask = 0777;
00762         uc->uc_ginfo = NULL;
00763         uc->uc_identity = NULL;
00764 
00765         RETURN(0);
00766 }
00767 
00774 int mdt_hsm_cdt_wakeup(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00775 {
00776         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00777         ENTRY;
00778 
00779         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)
00780                 RETURN(-ESRCH);
00781 
00782         /* wake up coordinator */
00783         cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags = SVC_EVENT;
00784         wake_up(&cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00785 
00786         RETURN(0);
00787 }
00788 
00795 int mdt_hsm_cdt_init(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00796 {
00797         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00798         struct mdt_thread_info  *cdt_mti = NULL;
00799         int                      rc;
00800         ENTRY;
00801 
00802         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_STOPPED;
00803 
00804         init_waitqueue_head(&cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00805         mutex_init(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00806         init_rwsem(&cdt->cdt_agent_lock);
00807         init_rwsem(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00808         mutex_init(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00809 
00810         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cdt->cdt_requests);
00811         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cdt->cdt_agents);
00812         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cdt->cdt_restore_hdl);
00813 
00814         rc = lu_env_init(&cdt->cdt_env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00815         if (rc < 0)
00816                 RETURN(rc);
00817 
00818         /* for mdt_ucred(), lu_ucred stored in lu_ucred_key */
00819         rc = lu_context_init(&cdt->cdt_session, LCT_SERVER_SESSION);
00820         if (rc == 0) {
00821                 lu_context_enter(&cdt->cdt_session);
00822                 cdt->cdt_env.le_ses = &cdt->cdt_session;
00823         } else {
00824                 lu_env_fini(&cdt->cdt_env);
00825                 RETURN(rc);
00826         }
00827 
00828         cdt_mti = lu_context_key_get(&cdt->cdt_env.le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00829         LASSERT(cdt_mti != NULL);
00830 
00831         cdt_mti->mti_env = &cdt->cdt_env;
00832         cdt_mti->mti_mdt = mdt;
00833 
00834         hsm_init_ucred(mdt_ucred(cdt_mti));
00835 
00836         /* default values for /proc tunnables
00837          * can be override by MGS conf */
00838         cdt->cdt_default_archive_id = 1;
00839         cdt->cdt_grace_delay = 60;
00840         cdt->cdt_loop_period = 10;
00841         cdt->cdt_max_requests = 3;
00842         cdt->cdt_policy = CDT_DEFAULT_POLICY;
00843         cdt->cdt_active_req_timeout = 3600;
00844 
00845         RETURN(0);
00846 }
00847 
00852 int  mdt_hsm_cdt_fini(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00853 {
00854         struct coordinator *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00855         ENTRY;
00856 
00857         lu_context_exit(cdt->cdt_env.le_ses);
00858         lu_context_fini(cdt->cdt_env.le_ses);
00859 
00860         lu_env_fini(&cdt->cdt_env);
00861 
00862         RETURN(0);
00863 }
00864 
00871 int mdt_hsm_cdt_start(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00872 {
00873         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00874         int                      rc;
00875         void                    *ptr;
00876         struct mdt_thread_info  *cdt_mti;
00877         struct task_struct      *task;
00878         ENTRY;
00879 
00880         /* functions defined but not yet used
00881          * this avoid compilation warning
00882          */
00883         ptr = dump_requests;
00884 
00885         if (cdt->cdt_state != CDT_STOPPED) {
00886                 CERROR("%s: Coordinator already started\n",
00887                        mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00888                 RETURN(-EALREADY);
00889         }
00890 
00891         CLASSERT(1 << (CDT_POLICY_SHIFT_COUNT - 1) == CDT_POLICY_LAST);
00892         cdt->cdt_policy = CDT_DEFAULT_POLICY;
00893 
00894         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_INIT;
00895 
00896         atomic_set(&cdt->cdt_compound_id, cfs_time_current_sec());
00897         /* just need to be larger than previous one */
00898         /* cdt_last_cookie is protected by cdt_llog_lock */
00899         cdt->cdt_last_cookie = cfs_time_current_sec();
00900         atomic_set(&cdt->cdt_request_count, 0);
00901         cdt->cdt_user_request_mask = (1UL << HSMA_RESTORE);
00902         cdt->cdt_group_request_mask = (1UL << HSMA_RESTORE);
00903         cdt->cdt_other_request_mask = (1UL << HSMA_RESTORE);
00904 
00905         /* to avoid deadlock when start is made through /proc
00906          * /proc entries are created by the coordinator thread */
00907 
00908         /* set up list of started restore requests */
00909         cdt_mti = lu_context_key_get(&cdt->cdt_env.le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00910         rc = mdt_hsm_pending_restore(cdt_mti);
00911         if (rc)
00912                 CERROR("%s: cannot take the layout locks needed"
00913                        " for registered restore: %d\n",
00914                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00915 
00916         task = kthread_run(mdt_coordinator, cdt_mti, "hsm_cdtr");
00917         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
00918                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
00919                 cdt->cdt_state = CDT_STOPPED;
00920                 CERROR("%s: error starting coordinator thread: %d\n",
00921                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00922                 RETURN(rc);
00923         } else {
00924                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: coordinator thread started\n",
00925                        mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00926                 rc = 0;
00927         }
00928 
00929         wait_event(cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
00930                        (cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags & SVC_RUNNING));
00931 
00932         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_RUNNING;
00933         mdt->mdt_opts.mo_coordinator = 1;
00934         RETURN(0);
00935 }
00936 
00941 int mdt_hsm_cdt_stop(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00942 {
00943         struct coordinator              *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00944         struct cdt_agent_req            *car, *tmp1;
00945         struct hsm_agent                *ha, *tmp2;
00946         struct cdt_restore_handle       *crh, *tmp3;
00947         struct mdt_thread_info          *cdt_mti;
00948         ENTRY;
00949 
00950         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED) {
00951                 CERROR("%s: Coordinator already stopped\n",
00952                        mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00953                 RETURN(-EALREADY);
00954         }
00955 
00956         if (cdt->cdt_state != CDT_STOPPING) {
00957                 /* stop coordinator thread before cleaning */
00958                 cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags = SVC_STOPPING;
00959                 wake_up(&cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
00960                 wait_event(cdt->cdt_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
00961                            cdt->cdt_thread.t_flags & SVC_STOPPED);
00962         }
00963         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_STOPPED;
00964 
00965         /* start cleaning */
00966         down_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00967         list_for_each_entry_safe(car, tmp1, &cdt->cdt_requests,
00968                                  car_request_list) {
00969                 list_del(&car->car_request_list);
00970                 mdt_cdt_free_request(car);
00971         }
00972         up_write(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
00973 
00974         down_write(&cdt->cdt_agent_lock);
00975         list_for_each_entry_safe(ha, tmp2, &cdt->cdt_agents, ha_list) {
00976                 list_del(&ha->ha_list);
00977                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ha);
00978         }
00979         up_write(&cdt->cdt_agent_lock);
00980 
00981         cdt_mti = lu_context_key_get(&cdt->cdt_env.le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00982         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00983         list_for_each_entry_safe(crh, tmp3, &cdt->cdt_restore_hdl, crh_list) {
00984                 struct mdt_object       *child;
00985 
00986                 /* give back layout lock */
00987                 child = mdt_object_find(&cdt->cdt_env, mdt, &crh->crh_fid);
00988                 if (!IS_ERR(child))
00989                         mdt_object_unlock_put(cdt_mti, child, &crh->crh_lh, 1);
00990 
00991                 list_del(&crh->crh_list);
00992 
00993                 OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(crh, mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem);
00994         }
00995         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
00996 
00997         mdt->mdt_opts.mo_coordinator = 0;
00998 
00999         RETURN(0);
01000 }
01001 
01011 int mdt_hsm_add_hal(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
01012                     struct hsm_action_list *hal, struct obd_uuid *uuid)
01013 {
01014         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
01015         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01016         struct hsm_action_item  *hai;
01017         int                      rc = 0, i;
01018         ENTRY;
01019 
01020         /* register request in memory list */
01021         hai = hai_first(hal);
01022         for (i = 0; i < hal->hal_count; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
01023                 struct cdt_agent_req *car;
01024 
01025                 /* in case of a cancel request, we first mark the ondisk
01026                  * record of the request we want to stop as canceled
01027                  * this does not change the cancel record
01028                  * it will be done when updating the request status
01029                  */
01030                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL) {
01031                         rc = mdt_agent_record_update(mti->mti_env, mti->mti_mdt,
01032                                                      &hai->hai_cookie,
01033                                                      1, ARS_CANCELED);
01034                         if (rc) {
01035                                 CERROR("%s: mdt_agent_record_update() failed, "
01036                                        "rc=%d, cannot update status to %s "
01037                                        "for cookie "LPX64"\n",
01038                                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc,
01039                                        agent_req_status2name(ARS_CANCELED),
01040                                        hai->hai_cookie);
01041                                 GOTO(out, rc);
01042                         }
01043 
01044                         /* find the running request to set it canceled */
01045                         car = mdt_cdt_find_request(cdt, hai->hai_cookie, NULL);
01046                         if (car != NULL) {
01047                                 car->car_canceled = 1;
01048                                 /* uuid has to be changed to the one running the
01049                                 * request to cancel */
01050                                 *uuid = car->car_uuid;
01051                                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
01052                         }
01053                         /* no need to memorize cancel request
01054                          * this also avoid a deadlock when we receive
01055                          * a purge all requests command
01056                          */
01057                         continue;
01058                 }
01059 
01060                 if (hai->hai_action == HSMA_ARCHIVE) {
01061                         struct mdt_object *obj;
01062                         struct md_hsm hsm;
01063 
01064                         obj = mdt_hsm_get_md_hsm(mti, &hai->hai_fid, &hsm);
01065                         if (IS_ERR(obj) && (PTR_ERR(obj) == -ENOENT))
01066                                 continue;
01067                         if (IS_ERR(obj))
01068                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
01069 
01070                         hsm.mh_flags |= HS_EXISTS;
01071                         hsm.mh_arch_id = hal->hal_archive_id;
01072                         rc = mdt_hsm_attr_set(mti, obj, &hsm);
01073                         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
01074                         if (rc)
01075                                 GOTO(out, rc);
01076                 }
01077 
01078                 car = mdt_cdt_alloc_request(hal->hal_compound_id,
01079                                             hal->hal_archive_id, hal->hal_flags,
01080                                             uuid, hai);
01081                 if (IS_ERR(car))
01082                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(car));
01083 
01084                 rc = mdt_cdt_add_request(cdt, car);
01085                 if (rc != 0)
01086                         mdt_cdt_free_request(car);
01087         }
01088 out:
01089         RETURN(rc);
01090 }
01091 
01099 static int hsm_swap_layouts(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
01100                             const lustre_fid *fid, const lustre_fid *dfid,
01101                             struct md_hsm *mh_common)
01102 {
01103         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
01104         struct mdt_object       *child1, *child2;
01105         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh2;
01106         int                      rc;
01107         ENTRY;
01108 
01109         child1 = mdt_object_find(mti->mti_env, mdt, fid);
01110         if (IS_ERR(child1))
01111                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(child1));
01112 
01113         /* we already have layout lock on FID so take only
01114          * on dfid */
01115         lh2 = &mti->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
01116         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh2, LCK_EX);
01117         child2 = mdt_object_find_lock(mti, dfid, lh2, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT);
01118         if (IS_ERR(child2))
01119                 GOTO(out_child1, rc = PTR_ERR(child2));
01120 
01121         /* if copy tool closes the volatile before sending the final
01122          * progress through llapi_hsm_copy_end(), all the objects
01123          * are removed and mdd_swap_layout LBUG */
01124         if (!mdt_object_exists(child2)) {
01125                 CERROR("%s: Copytool has closed volatile file "DFID"\n",
01126                        mdt_obd_name(mti->mti_mdt), PFID(dfid));
01127                 GOTO(out_child2, rc = -ENOENT);
01128         }
01129         /* Since we only handle restores here, unconditionally use
01130          * SWAP_LAYOUTS_MDS_HSM flag to ensure original layout will
01131          * be preserved in case of failure during swap_layout and not
01132          * leave a file in an intermediate but incoherent state.
01133          * But need to setup HSM xattr of data FID before, reuse
01134          * mti and mh presets for FID in hsm_cdt_request_completed(),
01135          * only need to clear RELEASED and DIRTY.
01136          */
01137         mh_common->mh_flags &= ~(HS_RELEASED | HS_DIRTY);
01138         rc = mdt_hsm_attr_set(mti, child2, mh_common);
01139         if (rc == 0)
01140                 rc = mo_swap_layouts(mti->mti_env,
01141                                      mdt_object_child(child1),
01142                                      mdt_object_child(child2),
01143                                      SWAP_LAYOUTS_MDS_HSM);
01144 
01145 out_child2:
01146         mdt_object_unlock_put(mti, child2, lh2, 1);
01147 out_child1:
01148         mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, child1);
01149 out:
01150         RETURN(rc);
01151 }
01152 
01161 static int hsm_cdt_request_completed(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
01162                                      struct hsm_progress_kernel *pgs,
01163                                      const struct cdt_agent_req *car,
01164                                      enum agent_req_status *status)
01165 {
01166         const struct lu_env     *env = mti->mti_env;
01167         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
01168         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01169         struct mdt_object       *obj = NULL;
01170         int                      cl_flags = 0, rc = 0;
01171         struct md_hsm            mh;
01172         bool                     is_mh_changed;
01173         ENTRY;
01174 
01175         /* default is to retry */
01176         *status = ARS_WAITING;
01177 
01178         /* find object by FID */
01179         obj = mdt_hsm_get_md_hsm(mti, &car->car_hai->hai_fid, &mh);
01180         /* we will update MD HSM only if needed */
01181         is_mh_changed = false;
01182         if (IS_ERR(obj)) {
01183                 /* object removed */
01184                 *status = ARS_SUCCEED;
01185                 goto unlock;
01186         }
01187 
01188         /* no need to change mh->mh_arch_id
01189          * mdt_hsm_get_md_hsm() got it from disk and it is still valid
01190          */
01191         if (pgs->hpk_errval != 0) {
01192                 switch (pgs->hpk_errval) {
01193                 case ENOSYS:
01194                         /* the copy tool does not support cancel
01195                          * so the cancel request is failed
01196                          * As we cannot distinguish a cancel progress
01197                          * from another action progress (they have the
01198                          * same cookie), we suppose here the CT returns
01199                          * ENOSYS only if does not support cancel
01200                          */
01201                         /* this can also happen when cdt calls it to
01202                          * for a timed out request */
01203                         *status = ARS_FAILED;
01204                         /* to have a cancel event in changelog */
01205                         pgs->hpk_errval = ECANCELED;
01206                         break;
01207                 case ECANCELED:
01208                         /* the request record has already been set to
01209                          * ARS_CANCELED, this set the cancel request
01210                          * to ARS_SUCCEED */
01211                         *status = ARS_SUCCEED;
01212                         break;
01213                 default:
01214                         *status = (cdt->cdt_policy & CDT_NORETRY_ACTION ||
01215                                    !(pgs->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_RETRY) ?
01216                                    ARS_FAILED : ARS_WAITING);
01217                         break;
01218                 }
01219 
01220                 if (pgs->hpk_errval > CLF_HSM_MAXERROR) {
01221                         CERROR("%s: Request "LPX64" on "DFID
01222                                " failed, error code %d too large\n",
01223                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01224                                pgs->hpk_cookie, PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid),
01225                                pgs->hpk_errval);
01226                         hsm_set_cl_error(&cl_flags,
01227                                          CLF_HSM_ERROVERFLOW);
01228                         rc = -EINVAL;
01229                 } else {
01230                         hsm_set_cl_error(&cl_flags, pgs->hpk_errval);
01231                 }
01232 
01233                 switch (car->car_hai->hai_action) {
01234                 case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
01235                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_ARCHIVE);
01236                         break;
01237                 case HSMA_RESTORE:
01238                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_RESTORE);
01239                         break;
01240                 case HSMA_REMOVE:
01241                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_REMOVE);
01242                         break;
01243                 case HSMA_CANCEL:
01244                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_CANCEL);
01245                         CERROR("%s: Failed request "LPX64" on "DFID
01246                                " cannot be a CANCEL\n",
01247                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01248                                pgs->hpk_cookie,
01249                                PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid));
01250                         break;
01251                 default:
01252                         CERROR("%s: Failed request "LPX64" on "DFID
01253                                " %d is an unknown action\n",
01254                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01255                                pgs->hpk_cookie, PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid),
01256                                car->car_hai->hai_action);
01257                         rc = -EINVAL;
01258                         break;
01259                 }
01260         } else {
01261                 *status = ARS_SUCCEED;
01262                 switch (car->car_hai->hai_action) {
01263                 case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
01264                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_ARCHIVE);
01265                         /* set ARCHIVE keep EXIST and clear LOST and
01266                          * DIRTY */
01267                         mh.mh_arch_ver = pgs->hpk_data_version;
01268                         mh.mh_flags |= HS_ARCHIVED;
01269                         mh.mh_flags &= ~(HS_LOST|HS_DIRTY);
01270                         is_mh_changed = true;
01271                         break;
01272                 case HSMA_RESTORE:
01273                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_RESTORE);
01274 
01275                         /* do not clear RELEASED and DIRTY here
01276                          * this will occur in hsm_swap_layouts()
01277                          */
01278 
01279                         /* Restoring has changed the file version on
01280                          * disk. */
01281                         mh.mh_arch_ver = pgs->hpk_data_version;
01282                         is_mh_changed = true;
01283                         break;
01284                 case HSMA_REMOVE:
01285                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_REMOVE);
01286                         /* clear ARCHIVED EXISTS and LOST */
01287                         mh.mh_flags &= ~(HS_ARCHIVED | HS_EXISTS | HS_LOST);
01288                         is_mh_changed = true;
01289                         break;
01290                 case HSMA_CANCEL:
01291                         hsm_set_cl_event(&cl_flags, HE_CANCEL);
01292                         CERROR("%s: Successful request "LPX64
01293                                " on "DFID
01294                                " cannot be a CANCEL\n",
01295                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01296                                pgs->hpk_cookie,
01297                                PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid));
01298                         break;
01299                 default:
01300                         CERROR("%s: Successful request "LPX64
01301                                " on "DFID
01302                                " %d is an unknown action\n",
01303                                mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01304                                pgs->hpk_cookie, PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid),
01305                                car->car_hai->hai_action);
01306                         rc = -EINVAL;
01307                         break;
01308                 }
01309         }
01310 
01311         /* rc != 0 means error when analysing action, it may come from
01312          * a crasy CT no need to manage DIRTY
01313          */
01314         if (rc == 0)
01315                 hsm_set_cl_flags(&cl_flags,
01316                                  mh.mh_flags & HS_DIRTY ? CLF_HSM_DIRTY : 0);
01317 
01318         /* unlock is done later, after layout lock management */
01319         if (is_mh_changed)
01320                 rc = mdt_hsm_attr_set(mti, obj, &mh);
01321 
01322 unlock:
01323         /* we give back layout lock only if restore was successful or
01324          * if restore was canceled or if policy is to not retry
01325          * in other cases we just unlock the object */
01326         if (car->car_hai->hai_action == HSMA_RESTORE &&
01327             (pgs->hpk_errval == 0 || pgs->hpk_errval == ECANCELED ||
01328              cdt->cdt_policy & CDT_NORETRY_ACTION)) {
01329                 struct cdt_restore_handle       *crh;
01330 
01331                 /* restore in data FID done, we swap the layouts
01332                  * only if restore is successful */
01333                 if (pgs->hpk_errval == 0) {
01334                         rc = hsm_swap_layouts(mti, &car->car_hai->hai_fid,
01335                                               &car->car_hai->hai_dfid, &mh);
01336                         if (rc) {
01337                                 if (cdt->cdt_policy & CDT_NORETRY_ACTION)
01338                                         *status = ARS_FAILED;
01339                                 pgs->hpk_errval = -rc;
01340                         }
01341                 }
01342                 /* we have to retry, so keep layout lock */
01343                 if (*status == ARS_WAITING)
01344                         GOTO(out, rc);
01345 
01346                 /* give back layout lock */
01347                 mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
01348                 crh = mdt_hsm_restore_hdl_find(cdt, &car->car_hai->hai_fid);
01349                 if (crh != NULL)
01350                         list_del(&crh->crh_list);
01351                 mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_restore_lock);
01352                 /* just give back layout lock, we keep
01353                  * the reference which is given back
01354                  * later with the lock for HSM flags */
01355                 if (!IS_ERR(obj) && crh != NULL)
01356                         mdt_object_unlock(mti, obj, &crh->crh_lh, 1);
01357 
01358                 if (crh != NULL)
01359                         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(crh, mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem);
01360         }
01361 
01362         GOTO(out, rc);
01363 
01364 out:
01365         if (obj != NULL && !IS_ERR(obj)) {
01366                 mo_changelog(env, CL_HSM, cl_flags,
01367                              mdt_object_child(obj));
01368                 mdt_object_put(mti->mti_env, obj);
01369         }
01370 
01371         RETURN(rc);
01372 }
01373 
01382 int mdt_hsm_update_request_state(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
01383                                  struct hsm_progress_kernel *pgs,
01384                                  const int update_record)
01385 {
01386         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mti->mti_mdt;
01387         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01388         struct cdt_agent_req    *car;
01389         int                      rc = 0;
01390         ENTRY;
01391 
01392         /* no coordinator started, so we cannot serve requests */
01393         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)
01394                 RETURN(-EAGAIN);
01395 
01396         /* first do sanity checks */
01397         car = mdt_cdt_update_request(cdt, pgs);
01398         if (IS_ERR(car)) {
01399                 CERROR("%s: Cannot find running request for cookie "LPX64
01400                        " on fid="DFID"\n",
01401                        mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01402                        pgs->hpk_cookie, PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid));
01403 
01404                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(car));
01405         }
01406 
01407         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Progress received for fid="DFID" cookie="LPX64
01408                       " action=%s flags=%d err=%d fid="DFID" dfid="DFID"\n",
01409                       PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid), pgs->hpk_cookie,
01410                       hsm_copytool_action2name(car->car_hai->hai_action),
01411                       pgs->hpk_flags, pgs->hpk_errval,
01412                       PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_fid),
01413                       PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_dfid));
01414 
01415         /* progress is done on FID or data FID depending of the action and
01416          * of the copy progress */
01417         /* for restore progress is used to send back the data FID to cdt */
01418         if (car->car_hai->hai_action == HSMA_RESTORE &&
01419             lu_fid_eq(&car->car_hai->hai_fid, &car->car_hai->hai_dfid))
01420                 car->car_hai->hai_dfid = pgs->hpk_fid;
01421 
01422         if ((car->car_hai->hai_action == HSMA_RESTORE ||
01423              car->car_hai->hai_action == HSMA_ARCHIVE) &&
01424             (!lu_fid_eq(&pgs->hpk_fid, &car->car_hai->hai_dfid) &&
01425              !lu_fid_eq(&pgs->hpk_fid, &car->car_hai->hai_fid))) {
01426                 CERROR("%s: Progress on "DFID" for cookie "LPX64
01427                        " does not match request FID "DFID" nor data FID "
01428                        DFID"\n",
01429                        mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01430                        PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid), pgs->hpk_cookie,
01431                        PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_fid),
01432                        PFID(&car->car_hai->hai_dfid));
01433                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01434         }
01435 
01436         if (pgs->hpk_errval != 0 && !(pgs->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_COMPLETED)) {
01437                 CERROR("%s: Progress on "DFID" for cookie "LPX64" action=%s"
01438                        " is not coherent (err=%d and not completed"
01439                        " (flags=%d))\n",
01440                        mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01441                        PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid), pgs->hpk_cookie,
01442                        hsm_copytool_action2name(car->car_hai->hai_action),
01443                        pgs->hpk_errval, pgs->hpk_flags);
01444                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01445         }
01446 
01447         /* now progress is valid */
01448 
01449         /* we use a root like ucred */
01450         hsm_init_ucred(mdt_ucred(mti));
01451 
01452         if (pgs->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_COMPLETED) {
01453                 enum agent_req_status    status;
01454 
01455                 rc = hsm_cdt_request_completed(mti, pgs, car, &status);
01456 
01457                 /* remove request from memory list */
01458                 mdt_cdt_remove_request(cdt, pgs->hpk_cookie);
01459 
01460                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Updating record: fid="DFID" cookie="LPX64
01461                               " action=%s status=%s\n", PFID(&pgs->hpk_fid),
01462                        pgs->hpk_cookie,
01463                        hsm_copytool_action2name(car->car_hai->hai_action),
01464                        agent_req_status2name(status));
01465 
01466                 if (update_record) {
01467                         int rc1;
01468 
01469                         rc1 = mdt_agent_record_update(mti->mti_env, mdt,
01470                                                      &pgs->hpk_cookie, 1,
01471                                                      status);
01472                         if (rc1)
01473                                 CERROR("%s: mdt_agent_record_update() failed,"
01474                                        " rc=%d, cannot update status to %s"
01475                                        " for cookie "LPX64"\n",
01476                                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc1,
01477                                        agent_req_status2name(status),
01478                                        pgs->hpk_cookie);
01479                         rc = (rc != 0 ? rc : rc1);
01480                 }
01481                 /* ct has completed a request, so a slot is available, wakeup
01482                  * cdt to find new work */
01483                 mdt_hsm_cdt_wakeup(mdt);
01484         } else {
01485                 /* if copytool send a progress on a canceled request
01486                  * we inform copytool it should stop
01487                  */
01488                 if (car->car_canceled == 1)
01489                         rc = -ECANCELED;
01490         }
01491         GOTO(out, rc);
01492 
01493 out:
01494         /* remove ref got from mdt_cdt_update_request() */
01495         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
01496 
01497         return rc;
01498 }
01499 
01500 
01505 struct hsm_cancel_all_data {
01506         struct mdt_device       *mdt;
01507 };
01508 
01519 static int mdt_cancel_all_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
01520                              struct llog_handle *llh,
01521                              struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr, void *data)
01522 {
01523         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
01524         struct hsm_cancel_all_data      *hcad;
01525         int                              rc = 0;
01526         ENTRY;
01527 
01528         larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
01529         hcad = data;
01530         if (larr->arr_status == ARS_WAITING ||
01531             larr->arr_status == ARS_STARTED) {
01532                 larr->arr_status = ARS_CANCELED;
01533                 larr->arr_req_change = cfs_time_current_sec();
01534                 rc = llog_write(env, llh, hdr, hdr->lrh_index);
01535         }
01536 
01537         RETURN(rc);
01538 }
01539 
01544 static int hsm_cancel_all_actions(struct mdt_device *mdt)
01545 {
01546         struct mdt_thread_info          *mti;
01547         struct coordinator              *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01548         struct cdt_agent_req            *car;
01549         struct hsm_action_list          *hal = NULL;
01550         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
01551         struct hsm_cancel_all_data       hcad;
01552         int                              hal_sz = 0, hal_len, rc;
01553         enum cdt_states                  save_state;
01554         ENTRY;
01555 
01556         /* retrieve coordinator context */
01557         mti = lu_context_key_get(&cdt->cdt_env.le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
01558 
01559         /* disable coordinator */
01560         save_state = cdt->cdt_state;
01561         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_DISABLE;
01562 
01563         /* send cancel to all running requests */
01564         down_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
01565         list_for_each_entry(car, &cdt->cdt_requests, car_request_list) {
01566                 mdt_cdt_get_request(car);
01567                 /* request is not yet removed from list, it will be done
01568                  * when copytool will return progress
01569                  */
01570 
01571                 if (car->car_hai->hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL) {
01572                         mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
01573                         continue;
01574                 }
01575 
01576                 /* needed size */
01577                 hal_len = sizeof(*hal) + cfs_size_round(MTI_NAME_MAXLEN + 1) +
01578                           cfs_size_round(car->car_hai->hai_len);
01579 
01580                 if (hal_len > hal_sz && hal_sz > 0) {
01581                         /* not enough room, free old buffer */
01582                         OBD_FREE(hal, hal_sz);
01583                         hal = NULL;
01584                 }
01585 
01586                 /* empty buffer, allocate one */
01587                 if (hal == NULL) {
01588                         hal_sz = hal_len;
01589                         OBD_ALLOC(hal, hal_sz);
01590                         if (hal == NULL) {
01591                                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
01592                                 up_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
01593                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01594                         }
01595                 }
01596 
01597                 hal->hal_version = HAL_VERSION;
01598                 obd_uuid2fsname(hal->hal_fsname, mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01599                                 MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
01600                 hal->hal_fsname[MTI_NAME_MAXLEN] = '\0';
01601                 hal->hal_compound_id = car->car_compound_id;
01602                 hal->hal_archive_id = car->car_archive_id;
01603                 hal->hal_flags = car->car_flags;
01604                 hal->hal_count = 0;
01605 
01606                 hai = hai_first(hal);
01607                 memcpy(hai, car->car_hai, car->car_hai->hai_len);
01608                 hai->hai_action = HSMA_CANCEL;
01609                 hal->hal_count = 1;
01610 
01611                 /* it is possible to safely call mdt_hsm_agent_send()
01612                  * (ie without a deadlock on cdt_request_lock), because the
01613                  * write lock is taken only if we are not in purge mode
01614                  * (mdt_hsm_agent_send() does not call mdt_cdt_add_request()
01615                  *   nor mdt_cdt_remove_request())
01616                  */
01617                 /* no conflict with cdt thread because cdt is disable and we
01618                  * have the request lock */
01619                 mdt_hsm_agent_send(mti, hal, 1);
01620 
01621                 mdt_cdt_put_request(car);
01622         }
01623         up_read(&cdt->cdt_request_lock);
01624 
01625         if (hal != NULL)
01626                 OBD_FREE(hal, hal_sz);
01627 
01628         /* cancel all on-disk records */
01629         hcad.mdt = mdt;
01630 
01631         rc = cdt_llog_process(mti->mti_env, mti->mti_mdt,
01632                               mdt_cancel_all_cb, &hcad);
01633 out:
01634         /* enable coordinator */
01635         cdt->cdt_state = save_state;
01636 
01637         RETURN(rc);
01638 }
01639 
01648 bool mdt_hsm_is_action_compat(const struct hsm_action_item *hai,
01649                               const int hal_an, const __u64 rq_flags,
01650                               const struct md_hsm *hsm)
01651 {
01652         int      is_compat = false;
01653         int      hsm_flags;
01654         ENTRY;
01655 
01656         hsm_flags = hsm->mh_flags;
01657         switch (hai->hai_action) {
01658         case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
01659                 if (!(hsm_flags & HS_NOARCHIVE) &&
01660                     (hsm_flags & HS_DIRTY || !(hsm_flags & HS_ARCHIVED)))
01661                         is_compat = true;
01662                 break;
01663         case HSMA_RESTORE:
01664                 if (!(hsm_flags & HS_DIRTY) && (hsm_flags & HS_RELEASED) &&
01665                     hsm_flags & HS_ARCHIVED && !(hsm_flags & HS_LOST))
01666                         is_compat = true;
01667                 break;
01668         case HSMA_REMOVE:
01669                 if (!(hsm_flags & HS_RELEASED) &&
01670                     (hsm_flags & (HS_ARCHIVED | HS_EXISTS)))
01671                         is_compat = true;
01672                 break;
01673         case HSMA_CANCEL:
01674                 is_compat = true;
01675                 break;
01676         }
01677         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "fid="DFID" action=%s flags="LPX64
01678                       " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64" hsm_flags=%.8X %s\n",
01679                       PFID(&hai->hai_fid),
01680                       hsm_copytool_action2name(hai->hai_action), rq_flags,
01681                       hai->hai_extent.offset, hai->hai_extent.length,
01682                       hsm->mh_flags,
01683                       (is_compat ? "compatible" : "uncompatible"));
01684 
01685         RETURN(is_compat);
01686 }
01687 
01688 /*
01689  * /proc interface used to get/set HSM behaviour (cdt->cdt_policy)
01690  */
01691 static const struct {
01692         __u64            bit;
01693         char            *name;
01694         char            *nickname;
01695 } hsm_policy_names[] = {
01696         { CDT_NONBLOCKING_RESTORE,      "NonBlockingRestore",   "NBR"},
01697         { CDT_NORETRY_ACTION,           "NoRetryAction",        "NRA"},
01698         { 0 },
01699 };
01700 
01707 static __u64 hsm_policy_str2bit(const char *name)
01708 {
01709         int      i;
01710 
01711         for (i = 0; hsm_policy_names[i].bit != 0; i++)
01712                 if (strcmp(hsm_policy_names[i].nickname, name) == 0 ||
01713                     strcmp(hsm_policy_names[i].name, name) == 0)
01714                         return hsm_policy_names[i].bit;
01715         return 0;
01716 }
01717 
01725 static void hsm_policy_bit2str(struct seq_file *m, const __u64 mask,
01726                                 const bool hexa)
01727 {
01728         int      i, j;
01729         __u64    bit;
01730         ENTRY;
01731 
01732         if (hexa)
01733                 seq_printf(m, "("LPX64") ", mask);
01734 
01735         for (i = 0; i < CDT_POLICY_SHIFT_COUNT; i++) {
01736                 bit = (1ULL << i);
01737 
01738                 for (j = 0; hsm_policy_names[j].bit != 0; j++) {
01739                         if (hsm_policy_names[j].bit == bit)
01740                                 break;
01741                 }
01742                 if (bit & mask)
01743                         seq_printf(m, "[%s] ", hsm_policy_names[j].name);
01744                 else
01745                         seq_printf(m, "%s ", hsm_policy_names[j].name);
01746         }
01747         /* remove last ' ' */
01748         m->count--;
01749         seq_putc(m, '\0');
01750 }
01751 
01752 /* methods to read/write HSM policy flags */
01753 static int mdt_hsm_policy_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
01754 {
01755         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;
01756         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01757         ENTRY;
01758 
01759         hsm_policy_bit2str(m, cdt->cdt_policy, false);
01760         RETURN(0);
01761 }
01762 
01763 static ssize_t
01764 mdt_hsm_policy_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
01765                          size_t count, loff_t *off)
01766 {
01767         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
01768         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;
01769         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
01770         char                    *start, *token, sign;
01771         char                    *buf;
01772         __u64                    policy;
01773         __u64                    add_mask, remove_mask, set_mask;
01774         int                      rc;
01775         ENTRY;
01776 
01777         if (count + 1 > PAGE_SIZE)
01778                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01779 
01780         OBD_ALLOC(buf, count + 1);
01781         if (buf == NULL)
01782                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01783 
01784         if (copy_from_user(buf, buffer, count))
01785                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
01786 
01787         buf[count] = '\0';
01788 
01789         start = buf;
01790         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: receive new policy: '%s'\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01791                start);
01792 
01793         add_mask = remove_mask = set_mask = 0;
01794         do {
01795                 token = strsep(&start, "\n ");
01796                 sign = *token;
01797 
01798                 if (sign == '\0')
01799                         continue;
01800 
01801                 if (sign == '-' || sign == '+')
01802                         token++;
01803 
01804                 policy = hsm_policy_str2bit(token);
01805                 if (policy == 0) {
01806                         CWARN("%s: '%s' is unknown, "
01807                               "supported policies are:\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01808                               token);
01809                         hsm_policy_bit2str(m, 0, false);
01810                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
01811                 }
01812                 switch (sign) {
01813                 case '-':
01814                         remove_mask |= policy;
01815                         break;
01816                 case '+':
01817                         add_mask |= policy;
01818                         break;
01819                 default:
01820                         set_mask |= policy;
01821                         break;
01822                 }
01823 
01824         } while (start != NULL);
01825 
01826         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: new policy: rm="LPX64" add="LPX64" set="LPX64"\n",
01827                mdt_obd_name(mdt), remove_mask, add_mask, set_mask);
01828 
01829         /* if no sign in all string, it is a clear and set
01830          * if some sign found, all unsigned are converted
01831          * to add
01832          * P1 P2 = set to P1 and P2
01833          * P1 -P2 = add P1 clear P2 same as +P1 -P2
01834          */
01835         if (remove_mask == 0 && add_mask == 0) {
01836                 cdt->cdt_policy = set_mask;
01837         } else {
01838                 cdt->cdt_policy |= set_mask | add_mask;
01839                 cdt->cdt_policy &= ~remove_mask;
01840         }
01841 
01842         GOTO(out, rc = count);
01843 
01844 out:
01845         OBD_FREE(buf, count + 1);
01846         RETURN(rc);
01847 }
01848 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_hsm_policy);
01849 
01850 #define GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(VAR)                                       \
01851 static int mdt_hsm_##VAR##_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)     \
01852 {                                                                       \
01853         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;                      \
01854         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;           \
01855         ENTRY;                                                          \
01856                                                                         \
01857         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", (__u64)cdt->VAR);                      \
01858         RETURN(0);                                                      \
01859 }                                                                       \
01860 static ssize_t                                                          \
01861 mdt_hsm_##VAR##_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer, \
01862                           size_t count, loff_t *off)                    \
01863                                                                         \
01864 {                                                                       \
01865         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;                \
01866         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;                      \
01867         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;           \
01868         __s64                    val;                                   \
01869         int                      rc;                                    \
01870         ENTRY;                                                          \
01871                                                                         \
01872         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);                   \
01873         if (rc)                                                         \
01874                 RETURN(rc);                                             \
01875         if (val > 0 && val < INT_MAX) {                                 \
01876                 cdt->VAR = val;                                         \
01877                 RETURN(count);                                          \
01878         }                                                               \
01879         RETURN(-EINVAL);                                                \
01880 }                                                                       \
01881 
01882 GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(cdt_loop_period)
01883 GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(cdt_grace_delay)
01884 GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(cdt_active_req_timeout)
01885 GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(cdt_max_requests)
01886 GENERATE_PROC_METHOD(cdt_default_archive_id)
01887 
01888 /*
01889  * procfs write method for MDT/hsm_control
01890  * proc entry is in mdt directory so data is mdt obd_device pointer
01891  */
01892 #define CDT_ENABLE_CMD   "enabled"
01893 #define CDT_STOP_CMD     "shutdown"
01894 #define CDT_DISABLE_CMD  "disabled"
01895 #define CDT_PURGE_CMD    "purge"
01896 #define CDT_HELP_CMD     "help"
01897 #define CDT_MAX_CMD_LEN  10
01898 
01899 ssize_t
01900 mdt_hsm_cdt_control_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
01901                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
01902 {
01903         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
01904         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
01905         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
01906         struct coordinator      *cdt = &(mdt->mdt_coordinator);
01907         int                      rc, usage = 0;
01908         char                     kernbuf[CDT_MAX_CMD_LEN];
01909         ENTRY;
01910 
01911         if (count == 0 || count >= sizeof(kernbuf))
01912                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01913 
01914         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
01915                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
01916         kernbuf[count] = 0;
01917 
01918         if (kernbuf[count - 1] == '\n')
01919                 kernbuf[count - 1] = 0;
01920 
01921         rc = 0;
01922         if (strcmp(kernbuf, CDT_ENABLE_CMD) == 0) {
01923                 if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_DISABLE) {
01924                         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_RUNNING;
01925                         mdt_hsm_cdt_wakeup(mdt);
01926                 } else {
01927                         rc = mdt_hsm_cdt_start(mdt);
01928                 }
01929         } else if (strcmp(kernbuf, CDT_STOP_CMD) == 0) {
01930                 if ((cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPING) ||
01931                     (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)) {
01932                         CERROR("%s: Coordinator already stopped\n",
01933                                mdt_obd_name(mdt));
01934                         rc = -EALREADY;
01935                 } else {
01936                         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_STOPPING;
01937                 }
01938         } else if (strcmp(kernbuf, CDT_DISABLE_CMD) == 0) {
01939                 if ((cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPING) ||
01940                     (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)) {
01941                         CERROR("%s: Coordinator is stopped\n",
01942                                mdt_obd_name(mdt));
01943                         rc = -EINVAL;
01944                 } else {
01945                         cdt->cdt_state = CDT_DISABLE;
01946                 }
01947         } else if (strcmp(kernbuf, CDT_PURGE_CMD) == 0) {
01948                 rc = hsm_cancel_all_actions(mdt);
01949         } else if (strcmp(kernbuf, CDT_HELP_CMD) == 0) {
01950                 usage = 1;
01951         } else {
01952                 usage = 1;
01953                 rc = -EINVAL;
01954         }
01955 
01956         if (usage == 1)
01957                 CERROR("%s: Valid coordinator control commands are: "
01958                        "%s %s %s %s %s\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01959                        CDT_ENABLE_CMD, CDT_STOP_CMD, CDT_DISABLE_CMD,
01960                        CDT_PURGE_CMD, CDT_HELP_CMD);
01961 
01962         if (rc)
01963                 RETURN(rc);
01964 
01965         RETURN(count);
01966 }
01967 
01968 int mdt_hsm_cdt_control_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
01969 {
01970         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
01971         struct coordinator      *cdt;
01972         ENTRY;
01973 
01974         cdt = &(mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev)->mdt_coordinator);
01975 
01976         if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_INIT)
01977                 seq_printf(m, "init\n");
01978         else if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_RUNNING)
01979                 seq_printf(m, "enabled\n");
01980         else if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPING)
01981                 seq_printf(m, "stopping\n");
01982         else if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_STOPPED)
01983                 seq_printf(m, "stopped\n");
01984         else if (cdt->cdt_state == CDT_DISABLE)
01985                 seq_printf(m, "disabled\n");
01986         else
01987                 seq_printf(m, "unknown\n");
01988 
01989         RETURN(0);
01990 }
01991 
01992 static int
01993 mdt_hsm_request_mask_show(struct seq_file *m, __u64 mask)
01994 {
01995         bool first = true;
01996         int i;
01997         ENTRY;
01998 
01999         for (i = 0; i < 8 * sizeof(mask); i++) {
02000                 if (mask & (1UL << i)) {
02001                         seq_printf(m, "%s%s", first ? "" : " ",
02002                                    hsm_copytool_action2name(i));
02003                         first = false;
02004                 }
02005         }
02006         seq_putc(m, '\n');
02007 
02008         RETURN(0);
02009 }
02010

02012 mdt_hsm_user_request_mask_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
02013 {
02014         struct mdt_device *mdt = m->private;
02015         struct coordinator *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
02016 
02017         return mdt_hsm_request_mask_show(m, cdt->cdt_user_request_mask);
02018 }

02037 
02038 static inline enum hsm_copytool_action
02039 hsm_copytool_name2action(const char *name)
02040 {
02041         if (strcasecmp(name, "NOOP") == 0)
02042                 return HSMA_NONE;
02043         else if (strcasecmp(name, "ARCHIVE") == 0)
02044                 return HSMA_ARCHIVE;
02045         else if (strcasecmp(name, "RESTORE") == 0)
02046                 return HSMA_RESTORE;
02047         else if (strcasecmp(name, "REMOVE") == 0)
02048                 return HSMA_REMOVE;
02049         else if (strcasecmp(name, "CANCEL") == 0)
02050                 return HSMA_CANCEL;
02051         else
02052                 return -1;
02053 }
02054 
02055 static ssize_t
02056 mdt_write_hsm_request_mask(struct file *file, const char __user *user_buf,
02057                             size_t user_count, __u64 *mask)
02058 {
02059         char *buf, *pos, *name;
02060         size_t buf_size;
02061         __u64 new_mask = 0;
02062         int rc;
02063         ENTRY;
02064 
02065         if (!(user_count < 4096))
02066                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02067 
02068         buf_size = user_count + 1;
02069 
02070         OBD_ALLOC(buf, buf_size);
02071         if (buf == NULL)
02072                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02073 
02074         if (copy_from_user(buf, user_buf, buf_size - 1))
02075                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
02076 
02077         buf[buf_size - 1] = '\0';
02078 
02079         pos = buf;
02080         while ((name = strsep(&pos, " \t\v\n")) != NULL) {
02081                 int action;
02082 
02083                 if (*name == '\0')
02084                         continue;
02085 
02086                 action = hsm_copytool_name2action(name);
02087                 if (action < 0)
02088                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
02089 
02090                 new_mask |= (1UL << action);
02091         }
02092 
02093         *mask = new_mask;
02094         rc = user_count;
02095 out:
02096         OBD_FREE(buf, buf_size);
02097 
02098         RETURN(rc);
02099 }
02100 
02101 static ssize_t
02102 mdt_hsm_user_request_mask_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
02103                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
02104 {
02105         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
02106         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;
02107         struct coordinator *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
02108 
02109         return mdt_write_hsm_request_mask(file, buf, count,
02110                                            &cdt->cdt_user_request_mask);
02111 }
02112 
02113 static ssize_t
02114 mdt_hsm_group_request_mask_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
02115                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
02116 {
02117         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
02118         struct mdt_device       *mdt = m->private;
02119         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;

02122                                            &cdt->cdt_group_request_mask);
02123 }
